attributes.action: Lilly-May Page Trust - ECG Routine Screening Age Lowered
attributes.additional_details:
After Lilly-May suddenly and tragically passing away due to Sudden Arrhythmia Death Syndrome. Lilly-May Page Trust strongly believe that Routine ECG Screening should be lowered to at least foundation age (4yrs) and also should be run at schools when a NHS nurse attends health checks. These ECGs will show if children are suffering with an undetected heart condition and can receive medication and hopefully help lower the amount of Sudden Cardiac Arrests that happen to children every year.
270 in UK Schools...
